# Start here: Registration and linking: [Video](https://www.loom.com/share/ca403db88eee453f900943b66b4acc82) # How to use Machinet AI: - For unit tests click blue arrow next to the method you want to cover. [Video](https://www.loom.com/share/d930013dd5b44c9eb06d6941f8d22208). > Note: to auto-heal a test or re-generate use blue refresh marker near the test - To use Chat with GPT-4 use Shift + Alt + E (Shift + Option + E for Mac) to open the window. [Video](https://www.loom.com/share/e94a6198bdc149c3b77b9cc6ae5713d4). > ProTip 1: Chat uses the currently open file as the main context. Make sure you open the Chat above the file you want to edit.

> ProTip 2: Use the names of classes in your query to put them in the model's context.

> ProTip 3: GPT-4 is a very powerful model, but it can't read your mind (yet). Please explain your command to model thoroughly.

> ProTip 4: Use Chat to create, edit a file, add content, fix errors, etc. You can place the code into the query too. - Machinet AI is heavily under development, to ask questions or submit errors use our [Discord.](https://discord.gg/3fBHzYzX57)
